high_level_findings: Confirmed Use-After-Free in failure path of `vhost_net_set_backend` due to improper pointer restoration.
Probable Integer Overflow in `vhost_net_build_xdp` length calculation leading to heap OOB write.
Confirmed Denial of Service via Zerocopy Descriptor Completion Signal Loss leading to persistent stall.
Confirmed Host Process Hang via Zerocopy Reference Pinning causing unkillable process state.
